name: KAHN & ASSOCIES
tag_list: legal, technology, internet, media, telecommunications, life-science, renewable-energy, clean-tech-industries
description: One of the leading French business law f
overview:
Kahn & AssociÃ©s is a leader in providing advice to the technology, internet, media, telecommunications, life science, renewable energy and clean tech industries and, more generally, to growth companies and to investors in these areas.

Our foremost objective is to provide perceptive and timely advice and assistance to clients in a practical and business-oriented manner. All our lawyers are flexible in adapting to each individual client’s needs and procedures.

We help French companies with all of their French and international needs, including establishing a presence abroad, tax structuring, co-ordinating international labor law aspects (contracts, income, social protection), and acquisitions or joint ventures abroad.

For the foreign-based multinational, whether this be a well-established or a newly founded company in its home jurisdiction, we assist in the set-up of a subsidiary and choice of appropriate legal entity and implementation, arm’s length, tax-efficient inter-company relationships and all the French company legal needs (contracts, regulations, labor, tax, litigationâ€¦). We also advise on the implementation of the foreign company’s acquisition or partnering strategy.

We are well connected to leading like-minded law firms around the world, and we have particularly strong relationships throughout Europe, North America, the Middle-East, and now Asia. Many of our clients ask us to arrange Europe-wide advice, and we are well equipped to co-ordinate legal work on a multi-jurisdictional basis.
